topics.body:
God damn it; I lost a month's worth of shit in minecraft.

That's it I'm not going to play minecraft until ftb 1.8 comes out cause I keep losing my shit and that's a lot.

If anyone else plays the direwolf modpack the easiest way to break the mod without cheating is get a laser drill, precharger, solar generator and just let minecraft run for about a month.  Also 99% of mods are completely fucking useless other than, "oh look at the shiny that you can unlock" so if you just don't bother with most of them you don't have to worry about them.  Shit like ars magicka and thaumcraft and such are pretty much all but useless; mods like applied energestics, openblocks, computercraft are far more useful.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53feff466368725989cc0100#post_53feff466368725989cc0100

Okay, wow I never realized that minecraft had that many issues. 

Well the good thing is I'm still just running with my 1.7 version. 

Also I gotta ask, for that fanfic I was talking about before in which the USA gets invaded by races from WOW. Historically speaking, the US government would take the advantage of going to war again wouldn't it? 

Though to be honest modern weaponry vs fantasy races using steel and iron based tools and armor kind of seems I dunno overkill doesn't it? Or maybe not, since the WOW races would have magic on their side, and shamans and so forth. 

But then again the US has tanks, jets, warships, ICBMs and a lot of guns. Hmm this is a little complicated for me, I'm torn between making this a story in which the US goes around kicking the crap out of the Horde and then invading the Night Elves homeland for oil, I mean they technically have access to such raw materials, its in the lore and game. 

And the other aspect would be more about exploring the world of Azeroth with the USMC, which is still pretty much the same thing as above, the only difference is that its more based on individual stories. Also a lot of cussing and violence, and marines trying to hit on elves... and hot girls. 'All guys would probably do that last part though, wouldn't we?'
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ff03f663687239aa890100#post_53ff03f663687239aa890100
Thaumcraft there is literally only two items that are actually useful.  Sometimes I feel as though mod creators go, "oh shiny" and forget to add in stuff that is actually useful.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ff051d6368725418730200#post_53ff051d6368725418730200

Okay. I used to play with weapon mods, that was fun for like the first half of the game and it became a pain in the ass since I had to keep looking for the right materials to make the ammo and guns. Also vehicle mods were fun, but I haven't used them since last year. 

Have you tried any of these other mods? Just for fun kind of stuff you know.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ff05d86368727687850200#post_53ff05d86368727687850200
I've tried literally hundreds.

Honestly what I think is probably going to happen to minecraft mods is that eventually a lot of the mod makers will stop updating and someone's going to come along and take the best things people have made and put it into a singular modpack or create their own version.  Openblocks has been recently taking a lot of mod concepts and making it their own lately.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ff07656368723de76b0200#post_53ff07656368723de76b0200

Okay cool, that sounds awesome, the one thing I'm curious about is what about those mods with water and HD textures? I mean have you seen the realistic water designs they have? Those are so freaking awesome, having them mixed in though would probably destroy the performance of a computer though.

But yeah Tekkit is also part of this packaged deal isn't it? I mean I like Tekkit cause there's a ton of stuff you can build and do with Tekkit, but making it run with a lot of other mods, I dunno, how compatible are all the mods right now?
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ff08916368725c467c0000#post_53ff08916368725c467c0000
I stay away from hd textures cause while they look cool as you said they destroy the performance of a computer.

A lot of the mods are compatible. . . Don't touch Galacticraft; it's terrible because on occasion it will completely shit the bed for no apparent reason.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ff099663687235912e0100#post_53ff099663687235912e0100

I heard about that, I can't believe how badly that screwed everyone's PCs. 

Man I used one mod which caused by PC to go and Blue Screen out of nowhere, I can't recall the name but it was supposed to be for changing land layouts, it overloaded my processor and the PC just crashed.
